titleInfo.title: Complete Chloroplast and Mitochondrial Genome Sequences of the Hydrocarbon Oil-Producing Green MicroalgaBotryococcus brauniiRace B (Showa)

mods.abstract: The green alga Botryococcus braunii is capable of the production and excretion of high quantities of long-chain hydrocarbons and exopolysaccharides. In this study, we present the complete plastid and mitochondrial genomes of the hydrocarbon-producing microalga Botryococcus braunii race B (Showa), with a total length of 156,498 and 129,356 bp, respectively.

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Blifernez-Klassen, Olga, Wibberg, Daniel, Winkler, Anika, Blom, Jochen, Goesmann, Alexander, Kalinowski, Jörn, and Kruse, Olaf. 2016. “Complete Chloroplast and Mitochondrial Genome Sequences of the Hydrocarbon Oil-Producing Green MicroalgaBotryococcus brauniiRace B (Showa)”. Genome Announcements 4 (3): e00524-16.

Genome Announcements. 4, : e00524-16 (2016).
